Package MARDA

package MARDA
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Board
    Abstract class that represents the logic aspects of the game board.
    BoardSquare
    Abstract class for representing the information of the pieces placed on squares.
    Controller
    Abstract class that represents the game controller.
    FileManager
    Abstract class that manages the saving and loading of game files.
    GUI
    Abstract class representing the GUI for a boardgame
    Moderator
    Abstract class for a moderator in charge of reviewing the game's state to determine if a player is out, legal moves and game over conditions.
    Piece
    Abstract class that represents a piece
    Player
    Abstract class that represents a player
